Description: The following statement contains a magic number: try              {                  if (args.Count() != 2)                  {                      Console.WriteLine("Usage: CreateTicks <filename> <number of ticks>");                      return;                  }                  string filename = args[0];                  int n = int.Parse(args[1]);                    var sw = Stopwatch.StartNew();                    Time t = DateTime.Now;                  using (var tf = TeaFile<Tick>.Create(filename))                  {                      tf.Write(Enumerable.Range(1' n).Select(i => new Tick {Time = t.AddDays(i)' Price = i * 101.0' Volume = i * 1000}));                  }                    sw.Stop();                  Console.WriteLine("execution time = " + sw.Elapsed.TotalMilliseconds + "ms");              }              catch (Exception ex)              {                  Console.WriteLine(ex.Message);              }
